message: I propose a fair split, where I take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount.  Let's get this over with quickly!
You're being too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
Okay, Bob, I see your point. I'm willing to be more reasonable this time.  Let's find a compromise we can both live with.
You're getting closer to being reasonable, Alice! But I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take all the power!
Bob, I'm starting to think we're both being stubborn. Let's make a deal and split the difference. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to see some flexibility from you as well.
I'm not backing down, Alice! I think I can do better than that. You're getting closer, but I need to see more!
